query: What infrastructure & tools will USDA stand up?
response: USDA will stand up a semi-federated AI infrastructure and a hub-and-spoke model, including the USDA AI Lab as the "hub" and Mission Area Innovation Incubators as the "spokes". This will allow for centralized, high-value tools and environments for testing and innovation, while also providing flexibility for customized tools. The USDA AI Lab will serve as a rapid-prototyping environment to accelerate the development and testing of AI solutions tailored to USDA's needs.
ground_truth: Semi-federated model; hub-and-spoke via USDA AI Lab (hub) + Mission Area incubators (spokes); enhance EDAPT; approved GenAI sandboxes.
reasoning: The White Agent's response accurately describes the USDA's planned semi-federated AI infrastructure and the hub-and-spoke model, correctly identifying the USDA AI Lab as the hub and Mission Area Innovation Incubators as the spokes. It aligns well with the ground truth answer.
